meta_description: Discover Cabot's Pueblo Museum, an architectural marvel in Desert Hot Springs. Explore exhibits, tours, events, and more as you immerse yourself in Cabot Yerxa's legacy.
hours_text:
Visit Museum[joseph@pointedservices.com](https://cabotsmuseum.org/author/josephpointedservices-com/ "Posts by joseph@pointedservices.com")2026-01-05T13:51:02-08:00

## Visit the Museum.

Come on an adventure to learn about Cabot Yerxa and his incredible home! We offer numerous ways to explore the museum, courtyard, outer buildings, exhibition gallery, and Water Gallery.

The summer hours are Tuesday, May 27, 2025, through September 30, 2025, from 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.

## Visit the Museum

Come on an adventure to learn about Cabot Yerxa and his incredible home! We offer numerous ways to explore the museum, courtyard, outer buildings, exhibition gallery, and Water Gallery.

### Guide/Self-guided Tours

### Grounds-Only Tours

### Membership

### School Trips

## Guided/Self-Guided Tours

When you select a Guided Tour or a Self-Guided Tour, your journey will lead you into the rooms of the pueblo to discover how Cabot Yerxa built the pueblo, what adventures he took, and how he made Desert Hot Springs his home. Each tour is approximately 45 minutes long. For **Guided** **and Self-Guided Tours** : Online tickets are available 24 hours a day. Please arrive 5-10 minutes before your tour time to check in at the Trading Post. The last tour entry is at 2:30 p.m. 

## Guide/Self-guided Tours

When you select an In-person Tour or an Audio Tour, your journey will lead you into the rooms of the pueblo to discover how Cabot Yerxa built the pueblo, what adventures he took, and how he made D...

## About the Museum

Cabot Yerxa was an adventurer, artist, and human rights advocate who built a Hopi-inspired pueblo out of reclaimed materials to highlight the culture and contributions of Native Americans.

[Learn about Cabot Yerxa ](https://cabotsmuseum.org/about/#cabot-yerxa)

[DISCOVER HIS PUEBLO MUSEUM](https://cabotsmuseum.org/about/#pueblo-museum)

[](https://cabotsmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Museums-Newsletter-3.jpg "Museum’s-Newsletter-3")
